name: Sniper Survival Monster Killer
description:
This world must be saved! Aggressive monsters invaded our small planet, and you’re the only one who can deal with them! Show them all who’s the boss here and you’ll be generously awarded! Download our new ultimate Sniper Survival Monster Killer game and you absolutely won’t be disappointed – the fate of the whole world is in your hands!

Enjoy fantastic surroundings trying to save your world from aggressive mutants! Show the whole world your sniper shooting skills and power them up with different difficulty levels! Have a great shooting experience and become the best sniper ever! Take your position, charge your sniper gun and be ready to save the world!

They came silently from the outer world; they’re cruel, horrible and brainless; their only aim is to destroy! Defeat your cunning rivals one by one – you are the only one who can save this planet! Prepare your powerful weapon, hold your breath and don’t let them come too close to you, if you don’t want to be defeated in Sniper Survival Monster Killer game!

Earn points for successfully repelled attacks and unlock wide range of powerful rifles, guns, pistols and other weapons to ease your game! Choose the best position ever and remember: the closer they are – the more terrible situation is! Do your best and stop this useless war!

Sniper Survival Monster Killer features:
• Wonderful opportunity to save the whole world from mutants
• Various types of interesting sniper weapons
• Addictive gameplay with simple and intuitive controls
• Fantastic graphics made in 3D

Mutants are everywhere – they want to conquer the world and do something terrible with the human race! You were chosen to stop them, ‘cause your sniper shooting skills are really amazing! Play Sniper Survival Monster Killer and save us all!
